text: John Oliver hits directly on the head that Fox News' coronavirus coverage is this way not because of facts or a belief it's the "real" narrative, but because they know it means "more viewers -- and more money to sell ads," writes @CillizzaCNN | Analysis https://t.co/cM5uQckMhl
